step: Prepare the dough: Mix flour, yeast, salt, and water to form a dough. Knead the dough for several minutes until it becomes smooth and elastic. Let it rise in a warm place for 1-2 hours.
Make the sauce: Blend tomatoes, garlic, olive oil, salt, and spices to form the sauce.
Roll out the dough: Place the dough on a floured surface and use a rolling pin to shape it into a circle or rectangle.
Add the sauce and toppings: Spread the sauce evenly over the dough and add toppings of your choice, such as cheese, meat, vegetables, etc.
Bake the pizza: Place the pizza on a baking sheet or pizza stone and bake in a preheated oven at 425-450Â°F for 12-15 minutes or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is melted.
Serve: Take the pizza out of the oven and let it cool for a few minutes. Slice and serve hot. Enjoy!
